name: 劳伦斯·拉金贝尔
name_full: 劳伦斯·拉金贝尔 Laurence Luckinbill
birth_place: 美国,阿肯色州,史密斯堡

last_movies.title: 法律与秩序 第一季

introduction: Best known in the theater world for writing, directing, and starring in one-man shows, Luckinbill was also Spock's half-brother Sybok in the film Star Trek V: The Final Frontier. He's married to Lucie Arnaz, daughter of Lucille Ball and Desi Arnaz, and is the uncle of directors Lana and Lilly Wachowski.
